articles.title: Google's ‘Ask for Me' Uses a Realistic AI Voice to Call Businesses for You
articles.summary: Google has launched an experimental AI service called "Ask for Me" that books appointments at auto repair shops and nail salons. This product is currently in an introductory phase and is being gradually rolled out.

articles.title: People unwell after action extinction rebellion in clothing store Naaldwijk
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Vid2Write, an AI-powered platform, transforms YouTube videos into SEO-optimized blog articles. This enables businesses to expand their reach beyond YouTube, improve SEO performance, and maximize content value by repurposing video content into written formats. Features include intelligent transcription, restructuring into engaging blog posts with keywords, and future plans for interactive content generation and multilingual support.

articles.title: The Best New Beauty Products of January 2025
articles.author: Sophie Dweck
articles.summary: The Phyto-Rouge Velvet lipstick, featuring a creamy formula, is launched. This matte lipstick glides over lips, depositing a bold color with a powder finish that lasts for 8+ hours. It is available in 10+ colors.

articles.title: Ziggi's testing lineup of ‘dirty sodas'
articles.author: Bizwest Staff
articles.summary: Ziggi's Coffee initiated a trial launch of a new 'dirty soda' menu. The company describes it as a 'fun, fizzy fusion of soda and creative flavor blends.'

articles.title: Apple could benefit from adopting this Galaxy S25 Ultra feature
articles.summary: Future iPhone models may incorporate advanced zoom functionality, a feature currently found in Samsung products. This enhancement aims to meet consumer demand for versatile camera systems and maintain competitiveness in the smartphone market by improving photographic capabilities.

articles.title: Burly Launches in New Zealand with Durable, Affordable Luggage and a Green Mission
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Burly, a new brand, has launched its travel luggage products in New Zealand. The company aims to offer premium quality luggage at accessible prices, focusing on sustainability and affordability.

articles.title: Google's ‘Ask for Me' Uses a Realistic AI Voice to Call Businesses for You
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Google is introducing "Ask for Me," an experimental AI voice program, through Google Search Labs. Currently, "Ask for Me" focuses on booking appointments at auto repair shops and nail salons. Google intends to expand the service to include additional types of businesses in the future.

articles.title: Amazon's 10 most-loved sweater dresses are so cute and cozy — they start at $17
articles.author: Rebecca Carhart
articles.summary: Amazon offers a wide variety of stylish and affordable sweater dresses, with many shopper-vetted options boasting thousands of five-star ratings and starting at $17. Amazon Prime members receive free shipping, while non-Prime members get free shipping on orders of $35 or more.

articles.title: We were convinced the Minimal Phone was vaporware, but it's now started shipping to backers
articles.author: Timi Cantisano
articles.summary: The Minimal Phone, featuring an E Ink display and physical QWERTY keyboard, is finally shipping after delays and runs Android 14. It has a 16MP camera, dual SIM card slot, and microSD card slot, with the base model (6GB RAM/128GB storage) priced at $399. The Light Phone 3, with a minimalist design and locked-down OS, is set for a potential launch in March 2025.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works' New Under-$20 Luxury Fragrance Mists Are Dupes for Baccarat Rouge 540, YSL Opium & More
articles.author: Kristine Fellizar
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works launched seven new fragrances to their Everyday Luxuries lineup, offering alternatives to luxury perfumes like Yves Saint Laurent's Opium, PHLUR's Father Figure, and Baccarat Rouge 540. The new scents include Midnight Addiction, Seeing Rouge, Madame Mystique, Loyal to You, You're Cheeky, Guilty as Fig, and Aqua Hour, with many receiving positive reviews as dupes for higher-end fragrances and are available at prices under $20.

articles.title: The Coolest Battery Temperature Monitoring Solution
articles.author: Power Technology
articles.summary: Brady Corporation is offering a new, more cost-efficient product.

articles.title: Eufy E20 3-in-1 robot vacuum review: A jack of all trades and a master of some
articles.author: Lloyd Coombes Gaming Editor
articles.summary: Eufy is launching its new E20 3-in-1 robot vacuum in February for £549, with a preorder discount available. The E20 features a 3-in-1 design converting it into a traditional or handheld vacuum with 8,000 Pa suction rating that can be increased to 30,000 Pa when plugged in as a traditional vacuum.

articles.title: Toyota RAV4 who? BYD importer slams Australia's best-selling SUV
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD's distributor promotes the competitiveness of the Sealion 6 mid-sized SUV. The distributor targets the best seller in the segment with the Sealion 6.

articles.title: Why BYD's importer thinks it has a better SUV than the Toyota RAV4
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD's distributor is aggressively positioning its Sealion 6 mid-sized SUV against the leading competitor in the segment. The distributor is highlighting the competitiveness of the Sealion 6.

articles.title: New Visions hosts Laundry of Love to improve access to clean clothes
articles.author: Hailey Peck
articles.summary: New Visions Homelessness Services is hosting "Laundry of Love" event at Wash Daze to provide free laundry services to community members. The event is scheduled to occur once a month, and individuals can sign up online at tinyurl.com/cblaundrylove for assistance.

articles.title: Toyota RAV4 who? BYD importer slams Australia's best-selling SUV
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: BYD's distributor is emphasizing the competitiveness of the Sealion 6, a mid-sized SUV.

articles.title: The 5 Best Peanut Butters, Based On Taste Tests
articles.author: Anna Perling
articles.summary: Skippy's Creamy Peanut Butter stands out as the best creamy variety due to its light, whipped texture and classic peanut taste. Teddie All Natural Super Chunky Peanut Butter is noted for its excellent textural variation among crunchy butters. Koeze's Cream-Nut Natural Smooth Peanut Butter is highlighted as a gourmet option, while Maranatha's Organic Creamy Peanut Butter offers a luscious, velvety mouthfeel.

articles.title: 5 Things the Nintendo Switch 2 Needs to Succeed
articles.author: Matt Kamen
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2 is expected to feature backward compatibility and improved screen resolutions. It potentially solves performance issues of original Switch games and may require developer patches to utilize the enhanced hardware, similar to Sony's PS5 Pro. The Switch 2 aims to offer at least 1080p Full HD resolution in handheld mode.

articles.title: The best Valentine's Day flower delivery services of 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.author: Amanda Garrity
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers, FTD, ProFlowers and Teleflora are online flower delivery services that use local florists to fulfill Valentine's day orders. These services prioritize freshness and quality with flower variety depending on the florist's location.

articles.title: What is 03-mini? OpenAI's Free AI Model To Counter DeepSeek
articles.author: Zubair Amin
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new AI model, o3-mini, for free users with usage limits in response to DeepSeek's R1 model. The o3-mini model is available in ChatGPT and the API, offering reasoning capabilities and matching the predecessor, o1, in areas like mathematics, coding, and science, but at a lower cost.

articles.title: Windows 11 Is Getting Google Photos-Like Search for OneDrive Photos
articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.summary: Microsoft is rolling out an update to Windows Search for Copilot+ PCs, enabling users to find photos in OneDrive using natural language queries within File Explorer. This feature is similar to Google Photos' search functionality and is currently available for Windows Insiders with Snapdragon-powered computers.

articles.title: Amazon slashes price of five-star rated smartwatch by 76%
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 76% discount on the WeurGhy Y6 Smart Watch, now priced at £23.99. Additionally, they have a 75% discount on the Kuizil Smart Watch and 43% off the Samsung Galaxy Fit3. Sky Mobile provides options to spread the cost of new devices like the Samsung Galaxy Watch7 and Apple Watch Series 10 via contract plans.

articles.title: Industrial designers share their process behind creating beloved products
articles.author: Kim Cook
articles.summary: Scott Henderson designed the Moby spout cover for Skip Hop, along with various kitchen products for brands like OXO and T-Fal. He also designed the ZShield face shield in collaboration with ZVerse. Dan Harden of Whipsaw designed the Owala FreeSip water bottle, Tonal smart home gym, and Tile tracker.

articles.title: Deal Alert: The Dyson V8 Absolute stick vacuum is $170 off this week
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the Dyson V8 Absolute stick vacuum at a discounted price of $349.99, which is $170 off its usual list price. The Dyson V8 Absolute features two cleaner heads, Fluffy™ for hard floors and Motorbar™ for carpets, alongside a fully sealed filtration system capturing 99.99% of microscopic particles.

articles.title: World's first AI-designed, 3D-printed shoe wants to be the next Crocs
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: Syntilay, a startup, has unveiled its AI-designed and 3D-printed shoe, available in five colors for $149.99. The shoes feature personalized comfort through smartphone foot scanning and are 100% recyclable, aiming for a closed-loop system.

articles.title: World's first AI-designed, 3D-printed shoe wants to be the next Crocs
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: Syntilay, a startup, has launched AI-designed and 3D-printed shoes priced at $149.99 per pair. These shoes feature personalized fit through smartphone foot scans, are available in five colors, and are 100% recyclable. The company aims to disrupt the footwear market by significantly reducing the time to market for new shoe releases.

articles.title: I'm obsessed with the viral Amazon window cleaning vac
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Beldray launched the Cordless Window Cleaning Vacuum XL, an updated version of their previous window vac, featuring a larger water tank. The product is available on Amazon and the Beldray website for £34.99. Reviews indicate streak-free cleaning on windows, mirrors, and glass surfaces.

articles.title: Yes, amika is my favorite haircare brand: Here's my full review
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Amika has launched several new hair products including Brooklyn Bombshell Blowout Spray, The Wizard Silicone-Free Detangling Primer, Smooth Over Frizz-Fighting Treatment, Mirrorball High Shine + Protect Conditioner, Blockade Heat Defense Serum, Perk Up Ultra Oil Control Dry Shampoo, Soulfood Nourishing Hair Mask, Hair Blow Dry Brush 2.0, Plus Size Perfect Body Mousse, Fluxus Touchable Hairspray, Big Hit Volumizing Shampoo/Conditioner, Velveteen Dream Smoothing Shampoo, Normcore Signature Shampoo, Reset Clarifying + Cleansing Gel Shampoo and The Confidante Moisture Maintenance Styler, each designed for specific hair needs such as frizz control, heat protection, shine enhancement, and volume boosting.

articles.title: Google's incredibly lifelike AI can now call businesses for you – here's how to use it
articles.author: Alex Blake
articles.summary: Google has launched Ask for Me, a new AI experiment designed to call businesses and gather information on pricing and availability. Currently, the service is limited to auto shops and nail salons. Ask for Me is part of Google's experimental Labs division.

articles.title: Panasonic Lumix G97 review: enthusiast-level camera, beginner-level price
articles.author: Rod Lawton
articles.summary: Panasonic has launched the Lumix G97, an updated version of the Lumix G95/90. The new model features a higher-resolution rear screen, removes the video recording limit, and includes a USB-C port for charging and power. It retains a 20MP Micro Four Thirds sensor and utilizes Panasonic's DFD contrast AF.

articles.title: From Late Nights at Old C's to Robot Couriers: How Food Delivery at CSU Has Transformed
articles.summary: Starship delivery robots are now operating at Colorado State University, delivering meals to students, faculty, and staff. These robots, equipped with separate compartments for hot and cold food, can carry the equivalent of three shopping bags, bringing convenience to the campus community.

articles.title: How Do Astronauts Deal With Dirty Laundry In Space?
articles.author: Dr. Alfredo Carpineti
articles.summary: Proctor & Gamble, in collaboration with NASA, tested Tide Infinity, a liquid detergent designed for water reuse, on the ISS in 2021 and during the Mars-analog CHAPEA mission in 2023. In 2022, they also tested Tide To-Go Wipes and Tide To-Go Pens for stain removal in space, addressing laundry challenges in extreme environments.

articles.title: Suzuki Jimny 4 Door Nomade Arrives in Japan
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Suzuki launched the Jimny Nomade, a 5-door version of the Jimny, in Japan. The Jimny Nomade features increased space and comfort and comes with new color options like Sizzling Red Metallic and Celestial Blue Pearl Metallic. Priced at 2,651,000 yen, it combines practicality, ruggedness, and style.

articles.title: Unilever eyes New York listing for ice-cream business, Bloomberg News reports
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Unilever is considering options, including a New York listing, for its ice cream business, which includes brands such as Ben & Jerry's and Breyers. The spin-off of the ice cream unit, also home to brands like Magnum, is expected to be completed by the end of 2025.

articles.title: Save 40% on Saie Matte Lipstick via Amazon
articles.author: Kelsey McCarson
articles.summary: Amazon is offering Saie Lip Blur Soft Matte Lipstick for $15, a 40% discount from its regular price of $24. The discount is applicable to all available shades, and Amazon Prime members benefit from free shipping and free returns. The lipstick is described as long-wearing, shine-free, hydrating, buildable, and comfortable with a natural softly-blurred to full coverage matte finish.

articles.title: Ninja Just Gave Their Hit Item a Big Upgrade, and Fans Say 'We Need It' Now
articles.author: Nathan Hutsenpiller
articles.summary: Ninja Kitchen is introducing the Ninja Swirl Creamifit, a new soft serve ice cream maker with upgraded technology. This model includes a soft-serve dispenser and aims to create perfect servings on the first try, eliminating the need for re-spinning. The product is expected to be available in February, and interested customers can sign up for updates on the Ninja website.

articles.title: UGG's Tazz slipper is back in stock in 2 new colors — and you're going to want them both
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: UGG released two new colors for its UGG Tazz Slipper in Sea Foam on January 31st, 2025. The new UGG Tazz slipper colors are available for $110.

articles.title: UGG's Tazz slipper is back in stock in 2 new colors — and you're going to want them both
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: UGG has launched two new colors, Bay Fog and Sea Foam, for its Tazz Slipper, priced at $110 each. These pastel colors, reminiscent of Easter hues, are available on UGG's website and are expected to sell out quickly, similar to the Tasman slipper.

articles.title: First Look at the New Balance Abzorb 2000
articles.author: Victor Deng
articles.summary: New Balance will launch a new lifestyle sneaker, the Abzorb 2000, in June. The sneaker features a textile mesh upper with overlay panels, the signature 'N' logo, and Abzorb cushioning in the midsole. The Abzorb 2000 silhouette is similar to the New Balance 9060.

articles.title: Air fryers vs multi-cookers: Which one is healthier, quicker and a better investment?
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article compares air fryers and multi-cookers, detailing their respective cooking functions and benefits. Air fryers are known for cooking crispy meals with little to no oil, while multi-cookers are versatile appliances that can handle pressure cooking, slow cooking, and steaming. The best choice depends on individual cooking needs and preferences.

articles.title: Here's how to buy this top-spec Samsung vacuum for half price - if you're quick
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Jet 95 Pro, a cordless stick vacuum cleaner featuring jet turbines for enhanced suction power and an hour of battery life. The vacuum includes interchangeable heads and a Z-station for easy charging. It is currently available on Amazon with a 46% discount, priced at £348.

articles.title: Successful Shark Tank Products You Can Buy Now!
articles.author: The Shoppers Club
articles.summary: The article highlights products that gained success after appearing on Shark Tank, including Bombas Hex Tec socks for running, the LARQ Bottle with UV-C LED sanitization, the Lovepop 3D pop-up cards, the temperature-controlled Scrub Daddy, and the Squatty Potty stool. These items exemplify entrepreneurship and innovation.

articles.title: Lush Bath Bot lo speaker etico per riempire di colori e musica i vostri bagni
articles.summary: Lush, a British company known for bath bombs, has launched the Bath Bot, a vegan and recyclable floating speaker. This new product combines Lush's expertise in bath products with technology, creating a unique digital bath bomb experience.

articles.title: Online On-Demand Laundry Service Market to Grow by USD 460.6 Billion (2025-2029), Rising Washing Machine Costs Boosting Market, Report on AI's Role
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: The global online on-demand laundry service market is projected to grow significantly, driven by increasing washing machine costs and adoption of automation technologies.  Companies like Mulberrys Garment Care, Laundryheap, and Cleanly are offering services such as dry cleaning, washing, and subscription-based pricing through mobile apps, with advancements in technology streamlining operations and enhancing customer experience. These services cater to residential users, offering time-saving solutions and convenience, leading to a transformation of the traditional laundry industry.

articles.title: Online On-Demand Laundry Service Market to Grow by USD 460.6 Billion (2025-2029), Rising Washing Machine Costs Boosting Market, Report on AI's Role
articles.author: Tech Navio
articles.summary: The global online on-demand laundry service market is projected to expand by USD 460.6 billion between 2025 and 2029, exhibiting a CAGR of nearly 53%. This growth is fueled by increasing washing machine costs and a trend towards automating laundry and delivery processes. Key companies in this market include American Dry Cleaning Co., ByNext Inc., CSC ServiceWorks Inc., Delivery.com LLC, and Rinse Inc.

articles.title: The Weeknd lança Hurry Up Tomorrow nesta sexta-feira (31/1)
articles.author: Luisa Mello
articles.summary: Juliette launched the EP 'Esquenta'. Juliette is preparing new features.

articles.title: Odd Burger Announces Nationwide Launch of Pizza
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Odd Burger Corporation launched plant-based pizza at all its Canadian restaurant locations on January 31st, 2025. The initial launch features four personal-sized 8-inch pizzas, including Cheese, Pepperoni, Hawaiian, and Plant-Meat Lovers, utilizing state-of-the-art cooking technology to prepare pizzas in 1:30 seconds.

articles.title: Little-known Argos tip just made Lenovo's newest tablet even cheaper
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Lenovo has released its newest tablets for 2024 and 2025, positioning them as a budget-friendly alternative to Apple and Samsung tablets. User reviews highlight the tablet's ease of use and speed, while some criticisms focus on screen quality and performance compared to higher-end options like the Samsung A9.

articles.title: Sweet Baton Rouge founder launches a podcast for local business owners
articles.author: Cynthea Corfah
articles.summary: Meredith Waguespack, founder of Sweet Baton Rouge, has launched The Nouveau Podcast, targeting local small business owners. Along with the podcast launch, Waguespack plans to offer digital products like a small business brand book guide and a marketing audit. She is also expanding Sweet Baton Rouge's product line by designing men's polos in the brand's colors.

articles.title: ASUS teases Zenfone 12 Ultra's upcoming launch
articles.author: Saurav Dey
articles.summary: ASUS is preparing to launch the ASUS Zenfone 12 Ultra on February 6, 2025. The phone features slender bezels, a punch-hole front camera, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. It's expected to be a rebranded version of the ASUS ROG Phone 9 Pro, offering a full AI experience.

articles.title: Samsung foldable phones 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The company is also preparing to release its new foldable lineup.

articles.title: Samsung Z Flip 7 processor
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series at its Galaxy Unpacked event. The company also has an upcoming foldable lineup known as the Galaxy series.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Flip 7 vs Z Fold 7
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event. Leaks also suggest an upcoming foldable lineup, the Galaxy…

articles.title: Samsung Z Flip 7 specs
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series at its Galaxy Unpacked event. Information about the upcoming foldable lineup, the Galaxy series, is also emerging.

articles.title: AI-powered no-code vs generative AI: who will win the race to build tomorrow's tech unicorns?
articles.author: Attila Kecsmar
articles.summary: AI-powered no-code platforms and generative AI tools are democratizing software development, enabling faster application development and reducing costs. Startups like Swapstack and Tiny Acquisitions have successfully launched using no-code tools, and other marketplace platforms can be created and iterated upon quickly and cost-effectively. Many no-code tools now integrate AI and generative AI features, like Microsoft Power Platform and Mendix embedding GPT-based assistants.

articles.title: 5 Best Sock Subscription Services (2025), Tested and Reviewed
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Subscription services now offer home delivery of premium socks, ensuring customers never run out.

articles.title: Google rolls out AI call feature 'Ask for Me'
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Google launched 'Ask for Me,' an AI-powered feature within Google's Search Labs that places calls to businesses on behalf of users to gather information like pricing and availability. The feature is currently being tested with auto shops and nail salons, with plans for future expansion, and uses underlying systems similar to those used for restaurant reservations via Google Search and Maps.

articles.title: Amazon £50 vacuum shoppers say is 'right up there with Dyson' and 'super fast'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a budget-friendly vacuum cleaner with features like a triple-action nozzle, smooth-rolling wheels, a rewindable cord, and a HEPA 12 filter, directly competing with higher-priced brands like Dyson and Shark. Customer feedback suggests that this model provides exceptional cleaning power and value, with some users preferring it over alternatives.

articles.title: Aldi introduces new £10 charge for shoppers entering supermarket
articles.author: Fahad Tariq
articles.summary: Aldi is trialling a £10 pre-payment charge at its Greenwich 'Shop and Go' store, which utilizes AI-powered cameras for a checkout-free experience, customers must download the Aldi Shop and Go app and register a payment card or tap their card at the entry gate. The pre-payment is designed to ensure available funds in the linked bank account for purchases.

articles.title: Amazon Prime members have hours left to use popular perk
articles.author: EMMA SALETTA
articles.summary: Amazon is discontinuing its "Try Before You Buy" service, which allowed Prime members to try on clothing items at home before purchasing. This decision stems from the limited reach of the program and the increasing use of new AI-powered features like virtual try-on and personalized size recommendations on the Amazon platform.

articles.title: Google Rolls out AI Call Feature 'Ask for Me'
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Google has launched 'Ask for Me,' a new AI-powered feature within Google's Search Labs that allows users to access information from businesses, such as pricing and availability, without directly calling them. The feature is currently being tested with auto shops and nail salons, with plans for future expansion. This technology builds upon Google's existing systems for restaurant reservations via Google Search and Google Maps.

articles.title: Google Unveils ‘Ask For Me' AI Feature In Search Labs: Here's How It Works
articles.author: Lavanya R
articles.summary: Google has launched an experimental AI feature called 'Ask for Me' through Google Search Labs. This feature enables users to let an AI chatbot call businesses on their behalf to inquire about services, prices, and availability. Initially available in select U.S. regions, the service currently supports queries about nail salons and auto repair shops, with plans for expansion.

articles.title: Google rolls out AI call feature 'Ask for Me'
articles.summary: Google has launched 'Ask for Me,' an AI-powered feature within Google's Search Labs that places calls to businesses on behalf of users to gather information like pricing and availability. Currently in testing with auto shops and nail salons, the feature aims to simplify interactions with businesses by providing quick details without requiring manual phone calls.

articles.title: I Wish These Android Phones Were Sold in the U.S.
articles.author: Joe Fedewa
articles.summary: Vivo's X200 Pro features a 200MP periscope telephoto lens, while Realme's GT 7 Pro boasts a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and a 6,500mAh battery with 120W charging. Xiaomi's Redmi Note 14 Pro+ includes a 200MP main camera and 120W charging, and the Oppo Find N5 is a thin foldable phone potentially launching as the OnePlus Open 2 in the U.S. Huawei's Mate XT folds twice and offers three modes with a Kirin 9010 processor.

articles.title: Capital One's new AI agent will help you buy your next car
articles.author: Jocelyn Mintz
articles.summary: Capital One has launched Chat Concierge, an AI agent designed to assist consumers with car buying by providing information, making decisions, and taking actions like comparing vehicles and scheduling test drives. The Chat Concierge uses Meta's Llama AI as a base and is customized with Capital One's data to help customers find relevant answers to their questions during the car buying process.

articles.title: This ‘Fluffy' New Mattress Pad Is Already a Best-Seller at Amazon, and It's Even Cheaper Right Now
articles.author: Isabel Garcia
articles.summary: Amazon recently launched the Beckham Hotel Collection Mattress Pad, which is currently the best-selling new mattress pad on the site. The mattress topper features plush padding, box stitching, a waterproof layer, and a deep pocket fitting mattresses up to 18 inches deep. It is machine washable and available in six sizes, with a 20 percent discount currently offered on all sizes.

articles.title: Sprouts grocery chain opening first St. Johns County store
articles.author: Action News Jax.com News Staff
articles.summary: Sprouts is opening a new location in St. Johns at 120 Shops Blvd. in 2025, with a grand opening event on Friday. The grand opening includes a 'pop-up party' with a tasting bar and a 'guess the weight' contest. The first 200 shoppers on Friday and Saturday will receive a free reusable goodie bag filled with special products.

articles.title: Mobile phone users never have to make calls AGAIN as Google launches bizarre new tool for appointments and more
articles.author: Millie Turner
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI-powered feature called 'Ask for Me' within Google Search Labs. This feature automates the task of booking appointments by using AI to call businesses, gather pricing and availability information. Currently in testing for nail salons and car repair shops, users can enable 'Ask for Me' in Search Labs and receive updates via email or phone.

articles.title: Mobile phone users never have to make calls AGAIN as Google launches bizarre new tool for appointments and more
articles.author: Millie Turner
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI tool called "Ask for Me" that automates appointment bookings for users. Currently in testing within Google Search Labs, it focuses on services like oil changes and nail appointments. Businesses can opt out of these automated calls via their Google Business Profile.

articles.title: Mobile phone users never have to make calls AGAIN as Google launches bizarre new tool for appointments and more
articles.author: Millie Turner
articles.summary: Google has launched "Ask for Me," an AI-powered tool within Google Search Labs that automates appointment booking for users. Currently, it's available for nail salons and car repair shops, gathering pricing and availability information. Users can access it by enabling the feature in Search Labs and providing booking details, after which the AI handles the appointment.

articles.title: I found a 'chic' Next co-ord in a 'trending colour' perfect for lazy days
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next has introduced a new Burgundy Red Jersey Polo Shirt and matching trousers loungewear set, priced at £34 and £36 respectively. The set features a soft cotton-blend fabric, a modern open-placket collar design, and an elasticated waist on the trousers. Adanola is also selling Knit Straight Leg Trousers for £49.99.

articles.title: Google's incredibly lifelike AI can now call businesses for you – here's how to use it
articles.author: Alex Blake
articles.summary: Google has launched a new experimental service called 'Ask for Me' through its Google Labs division. This AI-powered service uses Duplex technology to call businesses on behalf of users to inquire about pricing and availability for services like oil changes and nail salons. Users can join the waitlist to access the service via the Chrome browser in supported countries.

articles.title: POET Engaged by Global Financial Services Leader to Develop Custom Optical Engine
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: The Optical Interposer Platform demonstrates versatility. It adds a new revenue stream for the company.

articles.title: This remarkable robot vacuum is half price at the moment - we've tested it
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Hobot has released the Legee-D8 robot vacuum cleaner, which vacuums, wet mops, self-refills, washes, and dries, utilizing LiDAR and SLAM technology. The accompanying Lulu base station, sold separately, charges the vacuum, washes, scrubs, and dries the mopping cloth, and refills the spray tank. The Legee D8 features 5,000pa suction, anti-tangle technology, and a compaction system for dirt.

articles.title: Dentsu Partners with Adobe to Introduce Adobe GenStudio dentsu+
articles.author: dentsu
articles.summary: Dentsu and Adobe launched Adobe GenStudio dentsu+, a generative AI-powered marketing ecosystem. It combines Adobe's GenStudio with Dentsu's services and Merkury data platform, enabling personalized audience engagement. The solution aims to optimize content supply chains, reduce waste, and enhance marketing team efficiency.

articles.title: Dentsu Partners with Adobe to Introduce Adobe GenStudio dentsu+
articles.author: Dentsu
articles.summary: Dentsu, in partnership with Adobe, has launched Adobe GenStudio dentsu+, a generative AI-powered marketing ecosystem. This integrated solution combines Adobe's Content Supply Chain suite, including Adobe Experience Manager and Adobe Express, with Dentsu's audience intelligence and creative insights to enhance content creation and marketing campaign effectiveness for brands.

articles.title: Dentsu Partners with Adobe to Introduce Adobe GenStudio dentsu+
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Dentsu and Adobe launched Adobe GenStudio dentsu+, a generative AI-powered marketing ecosystem for brands. It combines Adobe's GenStudio suite with Dentsu's integrated services, technology, and audience intelligence, aiming to help marketers reach audiences in a personalized and scalable manner. The platform provides a unified view across campaign management, content supply chain, and identity mapping, improving efficiency and engagement.

articles.title: Best deals in the February sales revealed by Which? - Which? News
articles.author: Lisa Galliers
articles.summary: The article showcases deals on new and updated products. Samsung's Galaxy S24 FE, with its AI capabilities and powerful processor, is featured, alongside the Asus Vivobook S 14, a portable laptop with a Ryzen 7 processor and ample storage. The article also presents deals and key features for products like the Samsung QE55QN85D TV, Shark Stratos IZ400UKT vacuum cleaner, and Tefal Easy Fry Pizza air fryer.

articles.title: Newegg Sells Out of NVIDIA RTX 50 Series GPUs in Record Time
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Newegg experienced a high demand and rapid sell-out of the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs upon their launch. Gaming enthusiasts, content creators, system integrators, and PC builders rushed to purchase the new AI-powered graphics cards. The RTX 50 Series' launch is considered one of the most sought-after GPU releases.

articles.title: Best 32 inch TVs in 2025: Big entertainment in a size that fits anywhere, compact yet feature-rich for better viewing
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: The article highlights several 32-inch TVs from brands like LG, Sony, Redmi Xiaomi, Acer, Toshiba, Panasonic, VW, and TCL, showcasing their features and smart capabilities for 2025. These TVs come with features such as HD or Full HD resolution, smart platforms like Google TV or Android TV, and enhanced audio technologies like Dolby Audio, catering to various consumer needs for smaller spaces.

articles.title: Newegg Sells Out of NVIDIA RTX 50 Series GPUs in Record Time
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Newegg Commerce, Inc. experienced an overwhelming response to the launch of the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs. The inventory sold out within minutes due to high demand from gaming enthusiasts, content creators, system integrators, and PC builders.

articles.title: I tested DeepSeek against domestic AI chatbots to see if Nvidia is screwed
articles.author: Drew Magary
articles.summary: Alibaba launched an upgraded AI service, Qwen. The author tested AI chatbots, including DeepSeek, and ChatGPT and Gemini, evaluating their ability to answer questions, analyze writing style, and provide opinions. The author found the AI products to be parity products.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip4 deal offers huge £250 discount days before S25 hits UK stores
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering a refurbished Samsung Galaxy Z Flip4 at a discounted price of £449. The phone is available in multiple colors and includes 256GB of storage. The deal provides a more affordable option compared to Samsung's latest releases like the Galaxy S25 or Galaxy Z Flip 6.

articles.title: This crowdfunded E Ink QWERTY phone isn't vaporware after all
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Minimal Company has begun shipping the Minimal Phone, an Android 14 device featuring an E Ink display and a physical QWERTY keyboard, to its Indiegogo backers. This phone, priced starting at $399 for March delivery, includes features like NFC payments, a fingerprint sensor, Qi wireless charging, dual-SIM support, a headphone jack, and expandable storage.

articles.title: Advertyzed enters UAE, bringing data-driven growth marketing solutions to the region
articles.summary: Advertyzed has expanded into the UAE, introducing a comprehensive suite of digital marketing services tailored for businesses in the region. These services include Growth Marketing & Digital Strategy, Content & Creative Development, Personal Branding & Thought Leadership, E-commerce Growth & Lead Generation, AI-Enabled Advertising & Marketing Automation, and 360 Digital Transformation.

articles.title: Leaked: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Camera and Specifications
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge in April 2025 in 39 countries. The Galaxy S25 Edge is rumored to feature a 200MP primary rear camera, a 6.7-inch flat AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and will likely be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset.

articles.title: Dentsu and Adobe Speed Up Client AI Content Production With Adobe GenStudio Dentsu+
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: Dentsu and Adobe are launching Adobe GenStudio Dentsu+, an AI tool that helps brands scale content production efficiently. This tool integrates Adobe Experience Cloud, Adobe Creative Cloud, and Firefly's AI models, layered with Dentsu's proprietary tools like Merkury and GIA, to automate content creation and enhance performance marketing. Dentsu is charging clients a dynamic fee for GenStudio denstu+.

articles.title: The ‘flawless' and ‘so easy to use' brand new Ring doorbell now slashed by 40% on Amazon
articles.author: Stephanie Colderick
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the new Ring battery video doorbell to £59.99, saving shoppers 40%. This doorbell features HD video with color night vision and quick replies, and customers praise its quality, ease of use, and value for money. Other retailers like Currys, Argos and John Lewis also sells other Ring products.

articles.title: Auto review: Meet the first Jeep EV: the 2025 Wagoneer S Launch Edition
articles.author: Larry Printz
articles.summary: Jeep is launching the 2025 Jeep Wagoneer S Launch Edition, its first electric vehicle, positioning it as a quintessential new American luxury car. This vehicle is designed with connectivity, comfort, and safety in mind, and it is powered by electrons. It targets younger designers of the brand.

articles.title: Sky's the limit: AIS takes off with HOVERAir X1 Pro Max drone
articles.author: Bob Scott
articles.summary: Advanced Info Service (AIS) has launched the HOVERAir X1 Pro Max drone, featuring an 8K camera, foldable design, and a top speed of 47 km/h. It is available at AIS service shops and select outlets, with a promotional discount offered at the Thailand Mobile Expo 2025.

articles.title: Huawei Debuts Latest Devices in South Africa's Tech Market
articles.author: Itnewsafrica
articles.summary: Huawei launched the HUAWEI nova 13 smartphone and MatePad 11.5 tablet in South Africa. These new offerings aim to reinvent mobility through design, performance, and groundbreaking capabilities.

articles.title: SuperBuzz's AI Tools Help Drive Traffic and Increase Conversion Rates for Businesses in 2025
articles.summary: SuperBuzz, a Canadian AI marketing technology startup, is launching its AI-powered SaaS platform designed to optimize digital marketing strategies and increase website profits by automating content production and driving traffic through NLP. The platform focuses on personalization, AI chatbots, and performance enhancements to improve user experiences, boost conversion rates, and re-engage customers.

articles.title: Nikon unveils AI-incorporated camera
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Nikon launched the Z50II, a new camera incorporating AI for photography and videography. Nikon showcased the camera's features at an industry event. The Z50II is Nikon's latest product.

articles.title: Google Introduces ‘Ask for Me'—An AI-Powered Call Assistant for Local Businesses
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Google is testing a new AI feature called "Ask for Me" that enables users to have Google's AI call local businesses to inquire about service details like pricing and availability.  This service is currently available through Google's Search Labs and initially focuses on auto shops and nail salons.  It leverages Google's Duplex AI technology to automate customer interactions.

articles.title: Dragons' Den viewers slam ‘horrifically uncomfortable' offer - 'what a rotten deal'
articles.author: Monde Mwitumwa
articles.summary: Lucie Macleod, founder of Hair Syrup, pitched her haircare line on Dragons' Den, seeking investment for growth and mentorship.  The Dragons initially showed interest due to the brand's significant growth since its launch via TikTok in 2019. Touker Suleyman made an unconventional offer, which he later withdrew after concerns were raised about the terms, highlighting the challenges and potential for expansion of the Hair Syrup brand.

articles.title: Is your washing machine not working right? Try these easy fixes before you call a technician
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article suggests considering upgrading to larger washing machines or those with load-balancing technology if existing machines are too small or causing persistent issues. It also guides readers to resources such as AI washing machine buying guides and lists of top-load and front-load washing machines for those looking to purchase new appliances. The article refers several times to buying guides of different models of washing machines.

articles.title: Once Labelled Crazy, This Haryana Farmer Turned Scepticism into a Rs 2 Crore Honey Enterprise
articles.summary: Nature Fresh and Bee Buzz expanded its product offerings by diversifying into byproducts like beeswax and royal jelly, in addition to their existing honey products. This expansion is driven by leveraging diverse floral landscapes across India.

articles.title: Visible Promo Codes and Deals: Save On Phones and Plans
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Visible offers deals and promo codes for both new and existing customers. These promotions are highlighted on WIRED.

articles.title: Samsung Bespoke
articles.author: Nepali Times
articles.summary: Samsung Nepal introduced Bespoke 9kg front-load washing machines with AI features, starting at Rs101,999 and a 20-year warranty, alongside cashback and EMI offers. The upcoming Samsung S25 series will feature AI capabilities and recycled components and will be available for pre-order soon. Valentine's Day promotions include discounts on Z Fold6, Z Flip6, and S24 Ultra phones with free phone cases.

articles.title: Hull Road Service Station gets dalek-themed car wash facility
articles.author: Will Abbott
articles.summary: Inner Space Stations has launched Planet Wash, a new car wash facility at the Hull Road Service Station. This facility offers a superior, environmentally conscious clean wash system, specialist treatments like snow foam spray, and various payment methods including the Ready2Wash app. The location also features Shell fuel, Stone Willy's Kitchen, Rollover, Costa Coffee, and a Dog Wash.

articles.title: New mobile coffee business launches as positive Adam switches to new career path
articles.summary: Adam King is launching Kings of the Road Coffee, a new mobile coffee business, on February 1st. The business will offer barista-level coffee from a customized van at events and locations across the district. King plans to eventually open a coffee shop to create a positive social space.

articles.title: Google's new AI tool can call businesses on your behalf
articles.summary: Google is testing "Ask for Me," a new AI-powered feature that calls local businesses like nail salons and auto shops on behalf of users to gather information about service costs and availability. Built using Duplex technology, the feature collects details like the type of service needed and preferred appointment time. Businesses are notified that the call is automated and have the option to opt-out of receiving such calls.

articles.title: Raspberry Pi Focuses on Nigerian Market, Showcases Tech Products in Lagos
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Raspberry Pi launched its first product in 2012. The company has since launched various products across different market segments, achieving substantial sales worldwide.

articles.title: Google's 'Ask for Me' feature calls businesses on your behalf to inquire about services, pricing
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Google is currently testing a new AI-powered 'Ask for Me' feature. This feature uses artificial intelligence to autonomously call local businesses. It aims to gather pricing and availability information on behalf of the user, accessible on desktop and mobile for Search Labs participants.

articles.title: Out With The Old? Do you replace your smartphone frequently or stick with an older model?
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its new Galaxy S25 smartphone. The launch includes marketing efforts and discounts for early purchasers.

articles.title: *Tons* Of Amazon Customers Have These 29 Products On Their Wish Lists, So You'll Probably Want 'Em Too
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article highlights several new or noteworthy products, including Good Molecules eye gel with hyaluronic acid and caffeine, Wet & Forget shower cleaner, Apple AirPods 4 with personalized spatial audio, and a Stanley x Barbie cup. Also mentioned is granola butter from Oat Haus, which offers a nut butter-like texture free of the top eight allergens.

articles.title: Moxy Downtown Allentown opens
articles.author: April Gamiz
articles.summary: Moxy has opened Moxy Downtown Allentown. The opening occurred on January 30, 2025.

articles.title: New Café Concept Blends Creatives And Community
articles.author: Scoop
articles.summary: Café Create is a new bi-monthly breakfast gathering.

articles.title: Nokia Spencer 5G: Will Stretch Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and 144MP Main Camera
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nokia is launching the Spencer 5G, a new smartphone designed to transform mobile photography. The Spencer 5G features a 144MP main camera sensor, a 32MP Ultra-Wide lens, a 16MP wide sensor, a 5MP depth sensor, and a 64MP front-facing camera. Nokia asserts the Spencer 5G is crafted with premium materials and features Corning Gorilla Glass 7.

articles.title: $HAREHOLDER ALERT: The M&A Class Action Firm Maintains Investigation Into The Merger – ...
articles.author: Monteverde
articles.summary: Kaival Brands Innovations Group is set to introduce new flavors for the Bidi Stick and update its online configurator. These updates are aimed at enhancing customer experience and product options, with configurations priced at $5.95 per stick.

articles.title: Nikon unveils AI-incorporated camera
articles.author: Arinze Nwafor
articles.summary: Nikon has launched the Z50II, an AI-incorporated mirrorless camera designed for photographers and videographers. It is described as an affordable and powerful device with advanced features like low-light capability and an impressive auto-focusing system. Nikon is also exploring financing options to make the camera accessible to a wider audience.

articles.title: AT&T Refines Subscriber Experience With New Service Guarantee And More
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: AT&T is working to improve customer experience for subscribers. As part of this effort, AT&T is launching an industry-first service-level guarantee for consumers.

articles.title: UGG's Tazz slipper is back in stock in 2 new colors — and you're going ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: UGG, a shoe retailer, introduced new products appealing to customers. This announcement provides a reason for consumers to purchase a new pair of UGGs.

articles.title: JPMorgan says this beauty and wellness stock could be a winner in 2025
articles.author: system
articles.summary: JPMorgan suggests that Oddity's shares could increase due to the introduction of a new platform and potential future product launches.

articles.title: 'The Customer Whisperer: Turning Complaints into Compliments with a Wave of Your Wand' By Joan Johnston
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Joan Johnston has launched a new book, "The Customer Whisperer: Turning Complaints into Compliments with a Wave of Your Wand." The book guides readers on mastering exceptional customer service, drawing from the author's 50 years of experience in the public service and other human services sectors.

articles.title: Save �80 on Shark Air Styler in Amazon payday deal
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: A new hair drying and styling product is available, offering various styles. One buyer describes the product as a "revelation in hair drying and styling."

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - January 31, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci introduced a Velvet Pachouli Mini Basket Candle, described as a 7.1" high x 3.9" diameter cylinder made of blue metal with the word "GUCCI" embossed on it. The candle is patchouli-scented paraffin wax and has a burn time of 68 hours and costs $450.
